articles.author: Katie Hunt
articles.title: Oldest human DNA reveals lost branch of the human family tree - CNN
articles.description: Human DNA recovered from remains found in Europe is revealing our species’ shared history with Neanderthals. The trove is the oldest Homo sapiens DNA ever documented, scientists say.
articles.content:
